cause.description:
Hey im Jon and i would like to travel around the world. The thing is i realy need money and if people could help out that would be super cool. Just think you could help me do something most people never het to do. The people who donate would be helping me do something amazing, Please donate only if its a lil bit of money every thing helps just reach into you're pockets and give a something.
PS send money via paypal these noprofit sites steal from people send to jonfeddacent@gmail.com
1. Im realy bored with my life
2. I've always wanted to see Europe
3. I'll bring someone with me there will be a contest
cause.name: Jon wants to travel
